1663000.name: Forlorn: The mysteries of Highshadowland
1663000.description:
Edward Forlorn is a detective investigating supernatural cases. One day he receives a letter from Charles Richardson who is asking for help in finding his first cousin once removed George Richardson that was taken to the orphanage in Highshadowland. All the detectives hired by Richardson were gone in the orphanage and were never found, police refused to take this case to visit the orphanage.
Pay a visit to the desolate orphanage founded in Highshadowland by the ancient prosperous family the Lives to find George Richardson and find out where did all the inhabitants of the Live’s orphanage go and why do people entering the orphanage never get back home?
Features:
• Multiple locations: You’ve got to explore different chilling yet mesmerizing above-ground and underground locations and to find out all it’s mysteries.
• Riddles and puzzles: You will have to solve some puzzles and riddles to find keys and artifacts and answers to many questions.
• Enemies: You will encounter various enemies standing in your way and you will have to defeat them.
• Small craft: Sometimes you will have to craft things that will help you to survive and solve some riddles.
1663000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
